(F) 12/29/1986
model_outputs.model_answer:

(A) 01/31/1987

Note that all of the other options have a date which is either not in the year 1987 or not in the MM/DD/YYYY format that was requested, so they cannot be the correct answer.

- 02/16/2010 (Feb) : This would be Jane's 5th visit, per the question, and coincides with the date we calculated previously in February.

- 08/16/2010 (Aug) : This would be her 11th visit, per the question, continuing forward in time.

- 02/16/2011 (Feb) : This would be her 16th visit, continuing the trend forward in time.
